programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts reveals the natural history of the Ice Ages woolly mammoth. Mammoths have transfixed humans since the depths of the last Ice Age when their herds roamed across what is now Europe and Asia. Although extinct for thousands of years, scientists can now paint an incredibly detailed picture of their lives thanks to whole carcasses beautifully preserved in the Siberian permafrost.

programme.title: The Truth About Christmas Carols
programme.desc: There could be nothing more sweet and sentimental than the sound of traditional carols performed by a velvet-voiced choir at Christmas, or so you would think. Composer Howard Goodall uncovers the surprising and often secret history of the Christmas carol. Far from being accepted as part of the celebrations of Jesus birth, over the centuries carols have been banned by both church and state.

Joy spreads across the park as the keepers welcome some early Christmas presents - lots of new arrivals from afar, including furry binturongs, cute fennec foxes, adorable dik diks and some jumpy ostriches. Kate and Ben follow their first steps into the park as the keepers nervously mix them with the current residents. And will a long-term cheetah romance come good at Christmas?

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: Brazils favelas are considered extremely dangerous, making them one of the worlds most deadly places to grow up. As a result of poverty and a lack of government and police control, many young men here resort to drug dealing and gang crime under the control of the drug cartels. In other neighbourhoods, heavily armed criminal militia groups control day-to-day life with an iron grip, extorting residents - fail to pay or cross them, and the consequences can be deadly.

programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The Slaters prepare for a party, Howie makes a life-changing decision, and Lauren moots the idea of having Jimmy christened.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Zoe has some difficult questions for a loved one, Anthony collects evidence, and Nicola tries to protect Harry.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: A Trueman celebration descends into drama, Lily tries to help a loved one, and Nigel commences auditions for his film.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: A podcaster is murdered whilst investigating the disappearance of a child. Its a case thats haunted Selwyn for many years and now Neville and the team must lay its ghost to rest.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: All over Dublin, mothers are excitedly looking forward to seeing their loved ones return home for Christmas, but Agnes Brown is depressed. Her son Trevor is on the missions in Canada, and cant possibly afford to make it back. With Marias posh mum Hillary pressing the newlyweds to spend Christmas at her place, Agnes decides to compete for their love by providing an even more lavish Christmas celebration than Hillarys.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: It may be a time for peace and goodwill, but theres trouble brewing in the Brown household this Christmas. Cathy takes exception to having her mother opening her mail and instigates a clever plan for revenge.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Agnes Brown has finally been given permission to stage her own nativity play and is determined to put on the greatest show on earth. The only thing standing in her way now is local priest Father Damien who is insisting that Agnes makes some last-minute changes to her rather unusual script. Will Agnes ever get to play the Virgin Mary?

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Zoe confides in Lauren, George makes an effort to forgive, and Billy is given a mission by Lexi.

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mum out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Its an American special as Jeremy, Richard and James try to prove that a fly-drive holiday to Florida would be more fun if you bought a car instead of renting one. Having picked up some wheels for no more than $1,000 each, the boys embark on an epic road trip to find out who got the best deal, encountering heat, flies and very angry locals along the way.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Longing for her old life, Gemma tries reliving a past night out, only to realise she has changed forever and misses Sadie. Malcolms babysitting night in is upturned by Derek, who ropes Malcolm into helping him exact revenge on his ex-wife. In an attempt to support his friend, whilst keeping Sadie safe from all perceived threats, Malcolm panics when Gemma announces she is coming home early.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm takes Gemma and Sadie on a weekend break. When Malcolms estranged dad, Jackie, invites himself along, Malcolm calls Derek for support but soon discovers his secret addiction.

programme.title: Its What She Would Have Wanted
programme.desc: A short from comedian Holly Hall.

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: South Africa has for years battled the scourge of rhino poaching, fuelled by insatiable demand for their horns in Asia. Ashley embarks on a mission to find out who is behind these brutal acts, discovering how the challenges young men face growing up in deprived rural communities can lead to illegal poaching. Hanging out with men from KwaZulu-Natal - or Zululand - he earns their trust and joins them on a legal hunt for bushmeat in order to understand what day-to-day life is like here.

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: Brazils favelas are considered extremely dangerous, making them one of the worlds most deadly places to grow up. As a result of poverty and a lack of government and police control, many young men here resort to drug dealing and gang crime under the control of the drug cartels. In other neighbourhoods, heavily armed criminal militia groups control day-to-day life with an iron grip, extorting residents - fail to pay or cross them, and the consequences can be deadly.

programme.desc: Ross has married Emily, but during the reception she punches him and flees. Meanwhile, new lovers Monica and Chandler are finding it hard to keep their agreement.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Kissing
programme.desc: Rosss new wife wont speak to him, Rachel appoints Monica her adviser in romance, and Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe prepares to give birth but the doctor makes her nervous, Joey experiences his own pain, and Monica plans to go out on a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
programme.desc: Joey challenges Phoebe to perform a completely selfless act, Monica gets upset when Chandler gloats about sex, and Ross has a chance to get back together with Emily - but first he must make a tough decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tells Rachel that he cannot be around her once Emily comes to New York. Meanwhile, Chandler and Monica try to have a romantic weekend.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Rachel meet a monster, and will Ross obey Emily and move away from his friends?

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Moves In
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler regret letting Ross move in with them, while Rachel schemes to get her new neighbour to ask her on a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Warning notes on Ross lunch causes concern among his co-workers, and Phoebe takes a literature class.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: A Burger Burglar and a Supermarket Sweeper
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, Jamali Maddix and GK Barry have some controversial behaviour to contend with. Theres a shopping trolley thief, and a mother and daughter settle an awkward dispute.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Al Murray: One Man, One Guvnor
Utopia
programme.desc: Tony is on the verge of completing a major report when Rhonda invites a documentary crew to spend a week at the NBA offices. The NBA staff is divided over office catering.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Tony finds himself at loggerheads with Rhonda and Jim after refusing to back a major government initiative. Nat and Ash must break some bad news to the Minister.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stans ancient grandfather attempts to trick the boys into killing him. Meanwhile, the parents of South Park lobby a TV network to rid the airwaves of Terrance and Phillip.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Its Halloween and the Mir Space Station crashes to Earth, killing Kenny on impact. Soon, the zombies are taking over Southpark. Can the boys defeat the zombies before its too late?

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are watching a Terrance and Philip special in Cartmans house. When they see a commercial offering a free sports watch with a five dollar donation to famine relief, theyre overjoyed, but instead of receiving a watch, the boys receive an Ethiopian boy.

programme.desc: Jack continues his paranormal tour of Buckinghamshire, with a visit to a local theatre and an ancient pub, both rife with ghost sightings.

programme.desc: An altercation between the Stark and Baratheon children threatens to drive a wedge between the two noble houses.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Ned Stark arrives at Kings Landing, and before he can shake off the dust of the road, his presence is requested by the Small Council. On his way through the Red Keep, Ned sees Sir Jaime Lannister standing by the Iron Throne. The two men exchange barbs, and then Jaime recounts the day that the Mad King Aerys murdered Neds father and brother in the throne room.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: A raven flies through the gates of Winterfell, swooping past Bran Stark, whos standing in the courtyard practising his archery. He walks after the bird, and when he catches up to it, sees that the raven has three eyes. Bran wakens from the dream and finds himself in bed with his wolf Summer, still unable to walk. Theon Greyjoy enters the room with Hodor, a large and simpleminded stable boy, who carries Bran downstairs.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Silent Sisters perform rites over Ser Hugh of the Vales corpse and stitch up the throat wound that killed the young knight. Lord Ned Stark and Ser Barristan Selmy look on, discussing how Ser Hugh recently was raised to knighthood and received enough money to buy some fine new armour. Ned is also suspicious of how the knight came to be matched up against Ser Gregor Clegane, known as The Mountain, in the tourney.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned deals with all sorts of new issues while King Robert goes hunting, and Tyrion must stand trial at the Eyrie for his alleged crimes.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At his familys war camp, Lord Tywin Lannister butchers a stag and discusses their houses situation with his son Jaime Lannister, who reads Lord Ned Starks order for Tywin to appear at court. The patriarch reprimands his son for attacking Ned in the streets and explains how important it is to free Tyrion from the Eyrie: `Every day that he remains a prisoner, the less our name commands respect.

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: News from Alcaras concerning Carries hideout throws suspicion on all of the Irvines; Brian uncovers a betrayal from Peter, who accuses Lia of lying; a long-buried family secret threatens to tear the Irvines apart.

programme.title: True Detective: Night Country
programme.desc: Danvers and Navarro are trapped on the research station during a storm, without power or connection to the outside world. They have to face the demons of their past.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Trying to let go of police work and return to his marriage, McNulty gives up on identifying his Jane Doe. The detectives look into Sobotka and his money; they find a pattern in the computer and explain the connection to Daniels, but he still wont take the murders.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Hoping to work the angles, Kendall and Roman ask Shiv to invite a campaign insider to Logans pre-election day party.

programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King `It series.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The spectre of disloyalty among the crew hangs over Tony as Phil Leotardo decides how to handle recent issues with the Soprano crime family. Meanwhile, a hit gone wrong comes at a huge cost, and AJs conquering of his depression is challenged.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony tries to find a peace with the Leotardo crew while dealing with rumours that a member of his own crew may have flipped. Meanwhile, AJ makes a decision regarding his future, and Juniors slide into dementia continues.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Documentary series offering an eye-opening insight into the working lives of the residents of Brixham, Devon, one of UKs oldest and busiest fishing ports.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Heading to the Big Easy to visit the citys finest hotels, including the Monteleone, popular with writers such as F Scott Fitzgerald.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant visits more of the worlds most ostentatious, scandalous and exclusive hotels, beginning in Miami.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Mikaela and Sam once again join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robot The Fallen.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Elliots way to his wedding with Giselle gets longer when Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. They disguise themselves as dumb white socialites Brittany and Tiffany Wilson, the heiresses to a hotel fortune who are under threat. Gross-out comedic farce from the makers of `Scary Movie.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson writes an advice column for a fashionable magazine and agrees to demonstrate how easy it is to attract then alienate a man in just ten days. She chooses Benjamin Barry, little knowing hes an advertising executive whose job rests on proving he understands women so well that he can make one fall for him in two weeks.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Lets Dance
programme.desc: A widowed performer and her former dancing partner fight her wealthy mother-in-law for custody of her son.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Parallel coming-of-age stories of a layabout `serial nice guy living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased fathers fortune, and a bright but awkward youth whos tired of his mothers depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when the boy fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together).

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda is a gifted child, more gifted than any other, but her parents wont let her go to school. She teaches herself for years by going to the library and reading everything she sees. Eventually she convinces her parents to let her go to school, but discovers her special talents are needed to protect the school and her lovely teacher from the evil headmistress.

programme.title: Mouse Hunt
programme.desc: Slapstick tale which follows the misfortunes of two hard-up brothers whose plans to renovate and sell a valuable building are jeopardised by a rogue mouse. The brothers soon find themselves pulling out all the stops in order to evict their tiny resident.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travel sequel with Marty McFly and the eccentric inventor Doc Brown travelling back and forth in time to stop their nemesis tampering with history. By stealing the time machine and travelling back in time himself, Biff Tannen gives his younger self a book containing fifty years of sports statistics which he uses to amass an enormous gambling fortune and power.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Marty McFly travels to the American Wild West of 1885 in a desperate bid to save Doc Brown from becoming another victim of a black-hatted gunslinger.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Marmee is the head of the March household in the absence of her husband, whos away fighting in the US Civil War. Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl presents a department-store Santa with an odd request: reunite her divorced parents before her mother remarries.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Every Breath You Take
programme.desc: A psychiatrists life gets turned upside down when a patient takes her own life and he introduces her brother to his own family.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A hit man falls for his bosss wife when he is asked to escort her on a date, a boxer reneges on his promise to throw a big fight, and a couple attempt a heist that rapidly escalates out of control.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk tries to find out what happened before time runs out.

programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction

programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk tries to find out what happened before time runs out.

programme.title: Shadowlands

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Diabetic golden-cheeked gibbon Alex needs dental treatment but the operation is complicated by her condition and chimpanzee Eddi sends a wild intruder packing.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Newly arrived lemur Ben meets boss lady Fennel and conducts himself accordingly while baby orangutans Kiwi and Sibu explore a tunnel full of browse.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the oceans most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Moon: Natures Secret Force
programme.desc: Bringing the best in television programming.

programme.title: Attenborough At 90: Behind the Lens
programme.desc: In celebration of Sir David Attenboroughs 90th Birthday, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australias Ocean Wonder
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm
programme.desc: Spring is in the air and life on the farm is bursting out everywhere, as twin lambs Larry and Flora leap for joy in the meadow with the other newborns.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Kingdoms
programme.desc: The Drakensberg mountain range proves to be a tough home for its inhabitants. The animals there must endure the highest peaks to the rolling grassland.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Muellers gibbons Adidas and Dalumie head for the treetops for the first time, while Peanut, Pung-Yo and Tien, the endangered golden-cheeked gibbons, move into the enclosure next door. Plus, a specialist doctor is called in when Freddys bowel complaint fails to improve.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison Cronin travels to Monkey Worlds new endangered primate sanctuary in Vietnam, and meets the newest resident of the centre, Ellie the young golden-cheeked gibbon. Meanwhile, the team learn that two rare monkeys are being kept in a theme park outside Ho Chi Minh City, and attempt to get them freed.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: On the western coast of Newfoundland, Gros Morne National Park is a place of awe-inspiring natural beauty. Gros Morne is a paradise for hikers with a Mars-like terrain,the result of an earth-fracturing collision of continents nearly 500 million years ago.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: A look at the wildlife of Brazil.

programme.title: Planet Weird
programme.desc: Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: Steve Backshall explores the evolving understanding of whales, how much they have in common with humans, and how recent discoveries could help to better protect them from threats in an increasingly changing world.

programme.desc: Hammerheads, Galapagos sharks, rays, and other species populate the waters of Cocos Island.

programme.desc: A woman sues her grandsons father for child-care costs and a loan, but he says it was all a gift. Then, a man says he does not owe his ex for damages to her car because he was the victim of a hit-and-run accident.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Slapping a Child; Stolen Sister TV
programme.desc: Neighbours accuse each other of child abuse and harassment. Then, a woman says her sister stole her TV while she was in jail.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Cyclist in the Ped Crossing Smash!; Neighbor From Hell?!
programme.desc: An SUV-driver hits a bicyclist in a crosswalk; a single father says a neighbour gave him a car to make his life easier.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Mechanic Crosses a Line?!; Unbelievable Car Deal!
programme.desc: A mum and her teen son learn that a mechanic cut corners in fixing up the boys car; a young woman says she never looked online for her cars value.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Assault of the Landlord?!; Pedestrian Slam in a Parking Lot!
programme.desc: A landlord claims an unwanted houseguest broke in after locks were changed; motorist denies hitting a pedestrian.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Co-Parenting BBQ Snafu!; Prized Tennis Shoes Feud!
programme.desc: A toddler witnesses a violent altercation; a teenager sues her ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: He says she sold his car while he was in jail; she says he owes her damages for an assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Not Afraid of the Judge!; Property Tax Fight
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend accuse each other of assault; ex-lovers feud over $1,000.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A man says he chased attackers away with a lead pipe after they robbed and assaulted him at the banquet hall he rented for a party.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman says her ex owes her for an engagement ring, his share of a cruise, and a loan. Then, a plaintiff sues a man for crashing her car, making unauthorised charges on her card and ruining her credit.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: New York Restraining Orders; My Sisters Ex
programme.desc: Dueling restraining orders, a stolen car and accusations of slander come into play when a couple break up. Then, a defendant insists that his ex-fiancees sister never lent him $5,000.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Landlord Assault?; Case of the Missing TV
programme.desc: A landlord accuses a tenant of assault. Then, a defendant says the plaintiffs TV was stolen from her car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Steak-Knife Stabbing; Twin Sister Jewelry Heist
programme.desc: Feuding ex-lovers describe physical assault and destruction of property. Then, a twin makes excuses for pawning her sisters jewellery and denies owing for a loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: $30,000 Biker Magazine Buyout; Bar Friendship Gone Wrong
programme.desc: The plaintiff accuses her ex-lover of buying himself a new motorcycle instead of repaying her for an investment. Then, a woman lends more than 100 DVDs to a 20-year-old she met in a bar.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Dumping a bottle of bourbon incites a physical fight among family members.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teen Rental Hijinx; Gimme Back My Dog!
programme.desc: The owner of a vacation home sues for damage to the property and a cancelled payment. Then, a woman says her former friend sold and gave away her belongings, including her dog.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Friendly Loan or Cry for Help?; White Noise Leads to Homelessness?!
programme.desc: A man is accused of sharing a tragic story to get a sizeable loan; tenant claims an illegal eviction left her homeless.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Father Scams Inmate?!; Brothers Gift Backfires?!
programme.desc: After a Mustang purchase, a man gets incarcerated and claims he was scammed; a man sues his sister for unpaid parking tickets.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teen Lies to Police!; Rodent Disposal Fee Fight!
programme.desc: A teenager claims he took the fall for a friend after a car accident; a woman sues her step granddaughter for unpaid rent and rodent disposal fees.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Stealing From the Disabled?!; Stalking and Harassment?!
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-landlord of stealing rent from her disability account and evicting her; a man says he wants his belongings back from his ex-lover, especially his beloved barbecue.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers how the health and fortune of the village was shaped by those in charge of Bamburghs famous castle.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers the secrets of the Edwardian village of Thorpeness in Suffolk, the first purpose-built seaside village in the UK.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson visits Alnmouth on Englands north east coast and discovers the villages historical role in feeding the nation.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: 300,000 square miles of ocean. Three GPS-tracked voyages, filmed around the clock. One week at sea. Crabber Tydus has had a terrible year, missing months of fishing due to breakdown. With the boat finally fixed, skipper Stiggy pushes the crew to work around the clock to fill the tank with ten tonnes of crab. After covering expenses, Stiggy gambles and moves his pots further south.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: 300,000 sq miles of ocean. Three GPS-tracked voyages, filmed around the clock. One week at sea. Emilia Jayne hunts for cuttlefish in the worlds busiest shipping lane. Cargo ships have right of way here, but lucrative cuttlefish swim in these grounds too. After finding good fishing at the start of his week-long trip, can skipper Luke Selvey keep the secret to himself? Margaret of Ladram is Brixhams most successful trawler.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand square miles of ocean. Three GPS-tracked voyages, filmed around the clock. One week at sea. Storm Arwen hits the UK, with the potential to affect the countrys entire fishing fleet. In the North Sea, pair trawlers Victory Rose and Our Lass must come together each time they haul, making them vulnerable to collision in bad weather.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek checks out an abandoned 1985 Renault 4 and an MGB Roadster that hasnt seen the light of day for 36 years, and Jack heads to Rotherham to pick up a pair of rare Bond Bugs.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Northumberland to collect a rare 1975 NSU RO 80, Jack draws the short straw again with a Mini Mayfair stuck in a barn, and an Aston Martin DBS husk is auctioned.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: On the way to pick up two lovely 70s Lotus sports cars, Derek takes to the skies for his first ever helicopter flight in a 1967 Bell 47 chopper.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: The guys soon find their budget doesnt stretch when they go after a 4x4. However, Will comes up with a cunning plan.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at why mammals are the most successful creatures on the planet. Here he visits Australia and South America to study the lives of marsupials and then moves on to mammals such as humans, who develop their young in wombs rather than pouches.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: When the giant reptiles disappeared, the mammals seized the chance to conquer new territory. David meets moles that can swim through sand, a shrew that hunts underwater, and the worlds strangest bat in New Zealand.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at some of the biggest predators on Earth whose plant prey is armoured, indigestible and sometimes even poisonous. Among the animals examined are the sloth that lives on nothing but leaves, and the rubble rabbit that makes poisons work to its advantage as preservatives.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at rodents, all of whom possess incisor teeth with chisel-sharp enamel on their front edges. Among the animals observed are the agouti, a terrier-sized rodent that can bite through rock-hard shells, the beaver, which can fell trees with its teeth, and the capybara, a relative of the guinea pig, which is the largest rodent in the world.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon visits Istanbul, the beaches and crystal clear waters of the Aegean Sea, before ending up at the war torn border with Syria. He meets a producer now trying to sell wine in a Muslim country with an increasingly conservative government.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson explores an ancient trail along the stunning Jurassic Coast in Dorset, and comes face-to-skull with a giant Pliosaur, also known as a Sea-Rex.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: The guys soon find their budget doesnt stretch when they go after a 4x4. However, Will comes up with a cunning plan.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek brings a small army of military hardware to Thornton le Dale including a Studebaker Weasel tracked vehicle and a WWII-era Willys Jeep.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek, with help from the Mathewson clan, drag a mini pickup out of the barn where its been for 20 years, and a 350cc Douglas Mark V motorbike from 1950 goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Four VW camper vans pitch up at the auction house looking for a new home and Derek picks up an Austin 16 that goes like stink and has some unusual modern modifications.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek auctions off a Jensen Interceptor and a Jensen Healey along with a one-off Wood and Pickett Triumph Dolomite Sprint. Sarah takes a shine to a four-tonne road roller that needs a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A 1971 Mercedes SL and a 1989 Jaguar XJS emerge from a barn on a chicken farm, a Roller and a Rover go under the hammer and a 1966 Triumph Spitfire is restored to near perfection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson visits the village of Staithes in North Yorkshire and unearths its role in kickstarting the chemical industry in the north east of England.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson discovers how traditional boat building shaped the beautifully preserved village of Arnside on the banks of the River Kent in Lancashire.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson visits the picturesque Georgian village of Charlestown on the south west coast of Cornwall and learns how it wasshaped by the vision of one man.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Botallack was once at the centre of the Cornish tin and copper mining industry as archaeologist Ben Robinson discovers. By 1861, Botallacks mine was one of the biggest in the whole of Cornwall. Ben explores the villages mining past with archaeologist, Adam Sharpe, where he learns the mines produced millions and millions of pounds worth of copper and tin.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek has sold everything from trucks to bicycles - but he cant remember the last time he auctioned off a two-seater plane.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: 100 motorbikes come in for auction from every era of the 20th century. Also, the team assess a 1965 Vanden Plas Princess with a four litre Rolls Royce engine thats seen better days.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: The Rise of the Aircraft Carrier
programme.desc: In December 1941, the Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor. The attack brought America into World War II and changed the way battles were fought.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: As peace descends in 1945, the series ends with a sombre reminder of the human cost of the bloodiest conflict in history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce is in a festive mood as she opens this seasonal selection box from the Roadshow team. The most talked-about finds of the year are updated as Fiona reveals what happened after the cameras stopped rolling. Stories featured include the remarkable discovery by a viewer of a lost brooch by Victorian designer William Burges after she saw an appeal on the show.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Hartland Abbey in Devon. Amongst the items catching their eyes are the World War II notebooks of a young plane spotter who may have witnessed Glenn Millers last flight, a collection of pottery used for making clotted cream and a colourful assortment of early surfboards.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek picks out a solid-looking 1969 MGB for the team to look out for at auction. After winning it is sent to a father-and-son team to restore.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Dave alerts the team to a 1979 Lotus Esprit S3. The car is a thoroughbred classic that desperately needs a proper restoration, but its also an expensive purchase that risks not paying off.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: The Rise of the Aircraft Carrier
programme.desc: In December 1941, the Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor. The attack brought America into World War II and changed the way battles were fought.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: As peace descends in 1945, the series ends with a sombre reminder of the human cost of the bloodiest conflict in history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Thousands flock to Hartland Abbey in North Devon as the experts search for more treasure. Discoveries brought to the cameras include a quilt believed to have been made from ball gowns worn in the royal household, a valuable silver bowl damaged by a V bomb in World War 2, a haunted painting, and one of the rarest pieces of pressed glass in the world, which is given a four-figure valuation.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: During a cold snap Robbie gets iced in on the Grand Union Canal. Later, his parents pay a visit and help him through Marsworth Locks.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve explores Australia. His adventure starts in the `red centre of the continent and onwards through South Australia via the extraordinary Indian Pacific Railway, until he reaches the west coast city of Perth. On the way, he joins an Aussie rancher in the parched outback and visits the lucrative tuna fishing city of Port Lincoln. Finally in Perth, Simon discovers a full scale British invasion.

programme.title: Tum Se Tum Tak
programme.desc: Anu, a kind 20-year-old, and Aryavardhan, a resolute 45-year-old businessman, defy societal norms and family resistance, overcoming struggles to demonstrate that love transcends age or boundaries.

programme.title: Jagadhatri
programme.desc: A young woman faces various challenges as she navigates the dual roles of a responsible elder daughter within her family and her undercover mission as an agent.

programme.title: Jagriti
programme.desc: To empower her marginalised Chitta community, Jagriti challenges the age-old traditions and locks horns with its leader who works for the mafia.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.

programme.desc: Juhi Parmar hosts and offers Indian women a safe, empathetic platform to share their untold domestic stories-from emotional neglect to societal pressures.
